channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Duncan stages a small coup to oust Courtney as their new official class fire officer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter
channel.desc: Joel meets the stars of the new Superman film, we show you how to make your very own garden using just a jam jar, and Shini attempts martial arts.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Matter of Loaf and Death
channel.desc: Wallace and Gromit have opened a new bakery - Top Bun - and business is booming, not least because a deadly Cereal Killer has murdered all the other bakers in town. Gromit is worried that they may be the next victims, but Wallace does not care, as he has fallen head over heels in love with Piella Bakewell, former star of the Bake-O-Lite bread commercials. So Gromit is left to run things on his own, when he would much rather be getting better acquainted with Piella's lovely pet poodle Fluffles. But then Gromit makes a shocking discovery which points to the killer's true identity. Can he save his master from becoming the next baker to be butchered? And does Fluffles know more than she is saying? It all adds up to a classic 'who-doughnut' mystery, as four-time Academy Award-winning director Nick Park creates a hilarious new masterpiece in the tradition of 'master of suspense' Alfred Hitchcock. Featuring the voices of Peter Sallis (Wallace) and Sally Lindsay (Piella Bakewell).

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings play marbles, and it's driving Grizzy crazy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Home Sweet Rome
channel.desc: Lucy reinvents herself on a field trip. Francesca gets distracted from a big opportunity.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Now that B-troupe is officially going to the nationals, Cleo isn?t so sure they have earned it. Nick has concerns of his own, but an A-Troupe legend visits and shares that there is another, controversial, way to ensure the very best team represents the studio at the competition. As Cleo turns on her teammates, Richelle relies on hers after an upsetting run-in with a certain someone, and Ozzy speculates as to whether there is someone leaking private information about TNS.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Count Duckula is back, and he is determined to take over the world, one terrible TV show at a time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and the gang are fed up with dinner lady Olive's completely inedible school dinners. In their mission to 'drop the slop', they discover a poster of her past career as a singer. The gang ask her to join The Dinmakers, hoping she'll swap a life in the kitchen for fame. However, after unleashing Olive's inner diva, their new mission is how to get Olive back into the kitchen.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When the kids wonder about what they?ll be when they grow up, Mouse?s enhanced online career quiz leads Boy to think he is destined to be an astronaut, with Girl thinking she will end up a boring safety inspector. Both struggle to embrace their fates - but Mouse?s science can?t be wrong, can it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: To investigate why tummy rumbles are so loud when you?re hungry, the doctors call in the supersized stomach of Mega Xand! When Dr Chris and Dr Xand count down the Top 5 Bizarre-est Body Parts You Never Knew You Had, you will discover that the mysterious palmaris longus is so bizarre that you might not have it at all! The big question in Ouchology is whether it will be Dr Chris, Dr Xand or Dr Ronx who gets snotted by their kid quizmasters. If the doctors can put all the organs in the right place on their own bodies, they could win enough points to avoid the snot - but someone has to come last! Elsewhere, for Investigation Ouch!, Dr Chris finds out why real doctors are doing fake operations on fake organs inside fake patients in Nottingham. At the emergency department in Edinburgh, Alice has hurt her head and arm by accidentally running into a fence. And when Finlay arrives with burns on his forearms, the medics think it might have something to do with parsnips.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: 4 O'Clock Club
channel.desc: Polly has helped Evan with his family - but can he ever forgive her for revealing his secret? Meanwhile, Owen and Chester compete to see who will win the Pupil of the Year trophy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Someone has been eating the cookies in the caf?, and there is a rodent-shaped hole in reception. Thinking that there is a rat in the leisure centre, Danny and Mick put a plan into action to catch the illusive rodent. They will do whatever they can to find the culprit, including making a human-sized mouse trap.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: After last year?s staff photo ended in messy disaster, Sharon is determined to make sure this one goes without a hitch. So she tasks Danny and Mick with keeping the leisure centre and themselves totally clean until the photo takes place. With extra uniforms and all the cleaning equipment needed, surely they surely can?t fail at this simple task - can they.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: The bros go back to school as undercover teachers but have to do as the other says! Luckily, Glow Up Star Axel is there to help disguise the Bros as Mr Longgrass and Mr Pickles.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: The brothers learn about animals that like to take things slowly. They discover the top speed of a giant African land snail and see just how slow a sleepy sloth can get.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall and the team brave the intense heat of the Arizona desert as they go in search of more incredible animals for the Deadly 60 list. In order to demonstrate the awesome hunting skills of the Harris hawk, Steve becomes their prey for the day. Some state-of-the-art technology helps Steve track down deadly rattlesnakes and a real monster. It is then off to the mountains in search of a very elusive cat, the cougar. After seeing pictures captured by remote cameras, the team know the cats are there, but can they find them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve and the team are on the search for deadly animals in the steaming swamps of the southern USA. The contenders are everywhere, not least the alligators that live in just about every pond and lake. But the first animal on the list is a complete surprise, a monster fish with two rows of sharp fangs that certainly keeps Steve on his toes. The crew find themselves up to their armpits in a swamp hoping to find a deadly snake with the unusual name of cottonmouth. Last but not least, Steve and his team come face to face with an enormous record-breaking predatory turtle.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Things get explosive when Dr Chris and Dr Xand look at how spots are made, plus an incredible emergency service at work in Australia: the Flying Doctors.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Historical sketch show. King Charles I sends someone else to get married for him, a new recruit regrets joining the Georgian army, and Queen Cleopatra reveals her beauty secrets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: Historical sketch show. Barmy Roman emperor Caligula fails to invade Britain, King Henry VIII plays tennis while Anne Boleyn is executed, and some Saxon monks throw a party.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Bionic ends up dressed as a rabbit when Nitro pranks him at a fake photoshoot, and the rest of the Gladiators have fun behind the scenes as they prank the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold must travel to the Twystyverse to stop the evil tyrant Baron Silas von Penfold from taking over both versions of the Earth.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When the Baron speeds up the rotation of Earth using windmills, Danger Mouse and Penfold age 300 years and must take on their nemesis as very, very, very old men.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When Penfold saves a celebrity from certain doom he becomes a media sensation. DM smells a rat... or at least some evil villainous hamster from another dimension.

channel.desc: Rubi?s dance machine gets accidentally muddled up with Crusty the Robot Pie?s coding. Dennis and Gnasher have to dance on it all day in perfect sync, or Crusty?s entire persona will be wiped forever.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: A patch of wet cement, a boy and a dog itching to put their prints into it and a policeman determined not to let that happen. Can Dennis and Gnasher muddle Sergeant Slipper long enough before the cement sets.

channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The blossom has gone missing. No, not Blossom the unicorn, the blossom on the trees! The heroes are sent on a quest deep into the heart of the forest, where legend has it you can see a face watching you from the trees. Twinkle doesn?t believe in legends, but when help comes from nowhere as they try and stop the scoundrel that is stealing the blossom, she is forced to reconsider.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are relieved that the loud, threatening voice they can hear actually belongs to a small slug named Zorgoth, who is armed with a megaphone. However, when Zorgoth uses his Orb of Compression to shrink the heroes down to the size of ants, their relief evaporates. They must now embark on a long and dangerous quest, through their picnic items and beyond, to warn the Council before Zorgoth shrinks the entire forest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When the heroes quest to stop Balthazar from turning forest folk into household objects, Herbert realises that he can defeat the wizard?s spell by using the magic tricks he has practiced. Blossom is particularly intrigued by Herbert the Peculiar?s tricks, not to mention his stage name, so when Herbert himself is transformed into a table lamp, it?s Blossom the Very Impressive to the rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced, madcap stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. The band get a new trumpet player, with disastrous consequences. Also, the apple dropouts hatch an explosive plan to break free, and superhero Slippery Nana comes to the rescue to save a tomato... sort of! Deep in the back of the fridge, Frankfurter's monster is on the rampage, and Dr Rhu-barb surprises the judges with his white rabbit trick in the talent show.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: A mischievous new breed of dragons called Vine Tails steal the Book of Dragons.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Malory Towers
channel.desc: The girls try to cheer up Celeste, who wants to get expelled so she can go home to see her mother. Meanwhile, Mary-Lou finds herself facing a snail invasion when she takes an art class.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Addie and Audrey?s friendship blossoms as they go door-to-door to spread the word about Juniper?s witches. Maggie starts a secret rebellion, putting her at odds with Elinor.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: An overprotective Heath accuses Grace of sabotage, while Grace and Jonah make a bet to make it on to A-Troupe. Meanwhile, Izzy grapples with keeping Anthony?s secret.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: With A-Troupe all in on regionals, Pete takes his eyes off the Brawl and auditions for dance captain. Olive looks for a place where she belongs, while Grace dreams of joining A-Troupe.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Carter, Glen, Zane, and Skye must hide their secret identities from everyone. They are struggling with teamwork, when hot-headed Gormian Bors tries to prove the Scions don?t have what it takes. The Scions finally unite against him but, in so doing, they attract the attention of Graven.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings use a frog with hypnotising powers.
